startScreen.title: XXX
description: A 18+ game for honest conversations about sex, desire, and vulnerability.
Take turns answering. Listen deeply. Share honestly.

endScreen.title: Conversation Complete

xxx.name: xxx
xxx.description: Intimate, honest questions about sex and desire

questions.question: What do you wish you knew about other people's sex lives?
When was the last time something turned you on?
I wish I didn't have to ask for _____
What do you feel guilty for wanting? Not wanting?
Think about one thing you wish you had done differently in bed. Why?
When was the last time something turned you off?
Have you ever tried something and didn't like it? Why?
Think about the best sex you've ever had. What stands out?
Besides pleasure, what do you use sex for?
What part does shame play in your sex life?
What have you come to like?
If you could relive one moment in bed, what would it be?
What kind of sexual partner are you to yourself?
What would you ask for in bed if there were no consequences?
What are you craving in your life right now?
